#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
//#define ll long long
//#include<bits/stdc++.h>
int main()
{
    long long int t,a,p,c;
    int i,j;
    int n;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    scanf("%d",&n);

    int b;

    for(i=0;i<t;i++)
    {
        scanf("%lld %d",&a,&b);
        p=1;

        for(j=1;j<=b;j++)
            p=(p*a)%n;

        printf("%lld\n",p);
        }
    return 0;

}
